ranges.recommendation: Your AFP (liver cancer marker) level is raised. Raised AFP levels may also be associated with liver disease such as fatty liver, hepatitis, and liver cirrhosis. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.

Your CEA (colon cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of CEA are usually seen in smokers, and may be associated with colon cancer or other gastrointestinal cancers. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.

Your CEA (colon cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of CEA are usually seen in smokers, and may be associated with colon cancer or other gastrointestinal cancers. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.

The CA 19.9 (pancreatic cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of CA19.9 may be associated with pancreatic, cirrhosis, pancreatitis, and other gastrointestinal cancers. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.

Your CA 125 (ovarian cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of CA 125 may be associated with endometriosis, endometrial, ovarian, and other gynecological cancers. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.

age_ranges.recommendation: Your PSA (prostate cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of PSA may be associated with age, prostate and other cancers. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.
Your PSA (prostate cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of PSA may be associated with age, prostate and other cancers. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.
Your PSA (prostate cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of PSA may be associated with age, prostate and other cancers. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.
Your PSA (prostate cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of PSA may be associated with age, prostate and other cancers. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.
Your PSA (prostate cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of PSA may be associated with age, prostate and other cancers. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.

cancer_markers.parameter_name: Prostate Cancer Risk aka Free PSA %

ranges.recommendation: You have low risk of prostate cancer as indicated by your acceptable free PSA (\%) test result. Please consult our doctor for medical advice.
You have low risk of prostate cancer as indicated by your low free PSA (\%) test result. Please consult our doctor for medical advice.
You have high risk of prostate cancer as indicated by your very low free PSA (\%) test result. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.

Your EBV (nose cancer marker) level is equivocal. High levels of EBV may be associated with infectious mononucleosis, Burkitt's lymphoma, and nose cancer. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.

Your EBV (nose cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of EBV may be associated with infectious mononucleosis, Burkitt's lymphoma, and nose cancer. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.

Your CA 15.3 (breast cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of CA 15.3 may be associated with breast cancer, other non-malignant breast diseases, and liver disease. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.
Your Beta HCG (testicular cancer marker) level is raised. High levels of Beta HCG may indicate testicular cancer. Please consult our doctor for further medical advice.
